channel.title: Hi, I'm Dan one of the folks behind PayWhatevs.com
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
I love this forum! I've lurked for a long time :blush: but now it's time to introduce myself. I'm Dan, a developer/entrepreneur and consultant.
I'm one of the folks behind [PayWhatevs][1] an online service for content creators to sell their digital goods and services via their own storefront. Using a pay what you want, or fixed price, model sell directly to your supports for a fraction of the cost!
We just launched a couple of weeks ago and I'd love to get feedback from the community!
[1]: https://www.paywhatevs.com
